rows.label: qst620503_msg0001
rows.name:
Father! 
What is this? Your response to this
disaster was completely inadequate!

rows.label: qst620503_msg0002
rows.name: I am aware. I have read the reports.

rows.label: qst620503_msg0003
rows.name:
I have allowed matters to get out
of hand, it seems. 'Tis a situation of 
much inconvenience...

rows.label: qst620503_msg0004
rows.name:
What on Alst has made them 
want to rebel, though?

rows.label: qst620503_msg0005
rows.name:
There were some who learned the
secret. That we, the Luxurian, are 
not in fact descended from Adel.

rows.label: qst620503_msg0006
rows.name:
Many of them...could not accept this
as truth. They raged against it.

rows.label: qst620503_msg0007
rows.name:
That...
That makes sense.

rows.label: qst620503_msg0008
rows.name:
Their goal seemed to be to seize
the records from the founding of
Luxuria 500 years ago.

rows.label: qst620503_msg0009
rows.name: Ah, I see.

rows.label: qst620503_msg0010
rows.name:
If they were burned, and all record of 
the truth destroyed, we could reclaim
our position as descendants of Adel.

rows.label: qst620503_msg0011
rows.name:
And then we would not have to live in
shame. That, perhaps, was what the
rebels thought.

rows.label: qst620503_msg0012
rows.name:
But a timely intervention from yourself
and the Driver of the Holy Grail quashed the
rebellion before matters went too far.

rows.label: qst620503_msg0013
rows.name:
As much as I'd like to, we can't take
all the credit for this.

rows.label: qst620503_msg0014
rows.name:
We only managed to get wind of the
problems here because of Ibuki, one
of the Blades that's traveling with us.

rows.label: qst620503_msg0015
rows.name:
Oi! Ibuki! They're talking about you.
Get over here, would you?

呼びかけに気付くと
イブキ走って王様の前に移動

rows.label: qst620503_msg0016
rows.name: So you are Ibuki.

rows.label: qst620503_msg0017
rows.name: You have my gratitude.

rows.label: qst620503_msg0018
rows.name: OH! Oh oh oh!

rows.label: qst620503_msg0019
rows.name: It came back!

rows.label: qst620503_msg0020
rows.name: What did?

rows.label: qst620503_msg0021
rows.name: You lost something?

rows.label: qst620503_msg0022
rows.name:
No, no! What I heard at the inn!
It's all come back to me now.

rows.label: qst620503_msg0023
rows.name:
I thought it was about the uprising
at the palace?

rows.label: qst620503_msg0024
rows.name: Nah!

rows.label: qst620503_msg0025
rows.name:
What was it, now...?
Ah, that's it!

rows.label: qst620503_msg0026
rows.name:
Someone said the King sneaks round
the shops early in the morning to get
Adel's Embercakes for breakfast!

rows.label: qst620503_msg0027
rows.name: P-preposterous!

rows.label: qst620503_msg0028
rows.name:
How very dare they!
I mean... Why would I...?

rows.label: qst620503_msg0029
rows.name:
...I suppose somebody must have 
seen me. I was so careful.

rows.label: qst620503_msg0030
rows.name: Are you actually for real, right now?

rows.label: qst620503_msg0031
rows.name:
Don't look at me like that, son. You
love those embercakes as much as
the next person.

rows.label: qst620503_msg0032
rows.name:
You're not wrong, Father, but I never
took YOU for an embercake man!

rows.label: qst620503_msg0033
rows.name: Well, I hardly think...

rows.label: qst620503_msg0034
rows.name:
So the whole rebellion thing was just...
coincidence?

rows.label: qst620503_msg0035
rows.name: Looks like it.

rows.label: qst620503_msg0036
rows.name: More luck than brains, us...

rows.label: qst620503_msg0037
rows.name:
Regardless, your reward will be large.
For your help, of course, and for your
discretion regarding the embercakes.

rows.label: qst620503_msg0038
rows.name: Ahaha!

rows.label: qst620503_msg0039
rows.name:
Hah hah hah... Wait! Embercakes?!
I just heard the craziest rumor about
Embercakes!

rows.label: qst620503_msg0040
rows.name:
So, apparently... Uh... The thing is...
Well, these embercakes...
Ugh, I forgot again!

rows.label: qst620503_msg0041
rows.name: And let's keep it that way, shall we?
